name: Sector YAMA
description:
Summary:
Sector YAMA is a mix of RTS, Action and RPG genres with modern easy-to-play controls.
- Command troops in real-time combat with dozens of units on screen.
- Explore the map to find new allies, resources, and secrets.
- Meet cool characters.
- Participate in an epic space-opera story.

Gameplay mechanics:
Allies will automatically follow the player and attack enemies in range. The player's primary job is to gather a large force of allied troops, and then defeat enemy troops by tactically balancing his own position in a way that protects his allies from harm while also keeping himself alive.

Controls:
Move the player character with gamepad stick or keyboard wasd.
Attack enemies in range by stopping movement.
Interact with story characters by pressing gamepad A or keyboard F.
